Capitals Quiz

This app can be used to write a new quiz and save the quiz. Each quiz includes the State, 3 capital cities as options and another question asking whether the capital city is the largest city. Each correct answer will be rewarded with 1 point so you can get a maximum of 12 points for the quiz. Upon answering the question, you can swipe left to go to next question and at the end of last question, you can swipe left to get final score.

Open the nav drawer to view the navigation menu. You will be able to invoke the app\'s functions. You will be able to access the following screens:

New Quiz
Here, you will be able to start a new quiz and it consists of 12 questions. You will be able to answer each question bu clicking on one of the radio buttons provided.

Quiz History
Here, you will be able to review all of your previous quizzes. Each previous quiz consists of quiz id , quiz result and the date and time of the quiz. You can view each and every quiz answered by you.

Close app
The app will be closed.

Get help
Useful help information about the app will be displayed.
